name: PACIOFunctionalStatusImplementationGuide
title: PACIO Functional Status Implementation Guide
description: To advance interoperable health data exchange between post-acute care (PAC) and other providers, patients, and key stakeholders

resource.name: Bundled Functional Status
resource.description: An point in time bundle of functional status observations for a patient.

resource.name: Functional Status
resource.description: An exchange of functional status data for a patient.

resource.name: PACIO Questionnaire Response
resource.description: A completed, or sections of a completed, CMS PAC assessment.

resource.name: Prior Level Of Function
resource.description: An exchange of prior level of function data for a patient.

resource.name: UseOfDevice
resource.description: A device used by a Patient during a functional status assessment.

resource.name: AssistanceRequired
resource.description: Associated functional status used for display purposes.

resource.name: DevicePatientUsed
resource.description: A device used by a patient during a functional status assessment.

resource.name: PACIO Functional Status Capability Statement
resource.description: This Capability Statement defines the expected capabilities of a PACIO Functional Status FHIR server conforming to the PACIO functional Status Implementation Guide.
